content: Captain Kalpa-Wave is an required miniboss fight, and one of four "Captains" that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Guarding the entrance to the New Thunderclap Temple, you will have to defeat him to gain access to the final region of The New West.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Kalpa-Wave.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
Captain Kalpa-Wave is an required miniboss fight, and one of four "Captains" that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Guarding the entrance to the New Thunderclap Temple, you will have to defeat him to gain access to the final region of The New West.
